SEARCH
Package net.delugan.teachly.lesson

Class LessonService

java.lang.Object
net.delugan.teachly.lesson.LessonService
@Service public class LessonService extends Object
Service class for lesson-related operations. Provides methods for creating, updating, and generating lessons.

  • Method Details

    • createLesson

      public Lesson createLesson(LessonRequest lessonRequest, org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User oAuth2User)
      Creates a new lesson from a lesson request.
      Parameters:
      lessonRequest - The lesson request containing lesson data
      oAuth2User - The authenticated user who will be the author
      Returns:
      The created lesson
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if referenced entities are not found

    • updateLesson

      public Lesson updateLesson(Lesson lesson, LessonRequest lessonRequest)
      Updates an existing lesson with data from a lesson request.
      Parameters:
      lesson - The lesson to update
      lessonRequest - The lesson request containing updated data
      Returns:
      The updated lesson
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if referenced entities are not found

    • generateLesson

      public void generateLesson(Lesson lesson) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Generates code for a lesson based on its components. Creates JavaScript code that combines exercises, triggers, and rewards.
      Parameters:
      lesson - The lesson to generate code for
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if there's an error processing JSON
